plot: Shot in 1984 at the legendary Kwanongoma College of Music in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe featuring performances by the student marimba ensemble and an interview with teacher/composer Alport Mhlanga....
title: The Zimbabwean Marimba of Alport Mhlanga
